intent.user_query: Which product brands had the highest average quantity sold per transaction in the last 3 months?

phases.goal:
Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT p.Brand, AVG(sd.Quantity) AS AverageQuantitySold
FROM fitness_db.SaleDetails sd
JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON sd.SaleID = s.SaleID
JOIN fitness_db.Products p ON sd.ProductID = p.ProductID
WHERE s.SaleDate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '3' MONTH
GROUP BY p.Brand
ORDER BY AverageQuantitySold DESC;

arguments.sql:
SELECT p.Brand, AVG(sd.Quantity) AS AverageQuantitySold
FROM fitness_db.SaleDetails sd
JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON sd.SaleID = s.SaleID
JOIN fitness_db.Products p ON sd.ProductID = p.ProductID
WHERE s.SaleDate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '3' MONTH
GROUP BY p.Brand
ORDER BY AverageQuantitySold DESC;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
